Risk factors for small intestine cancer include the following:         - Eating a high-fat diet.    - Having Crohn disease.     - Having celiac disease.    -  Having familial adenomatous polyposis (FAP).,CancerGov,Small Intestine Cancer
What are the symptoms of Small Intestine Cancer ?,Signs and symptoms of small intestine cancer include unexplained weight loss and abdominal pain. Thes
